description: Linking Civil Society and Media to Peace and state Building

subproject.description: The project aims at fostering inclusive governance, hence engagement of civil society in the formulation of government policies and legislation as well as in national dialogue initiatives aimed at strengthening national cohesion around common values and shared interest. It also aims at developing media capacity in Somalia to raise professional standards of reporting on governance issues.
subproject.title: Linking CS and Media to Peace

title: Civic Engagement in National Dialogue
